name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY1】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [cB-gslGpCO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Highlights set to the song 'Choreography' featuring a list of Lunch Box support participants.
Waiting screen for the 8th Anniversary Party with event information and rules.
Highlights set to the song 'Frusta' featuring a list of Flower Stand support participants.
Highlights set to the song 'Choreography' with more support participant names.
Highlights set to 'Frusta' with scrolling support names.
Waiting screen with social media policy information.
Extended highlights reel featuring the song 'Frusta'.
Waiting screen transition with instrumental music.
Highlights set to the song 'Twilight City' with the donor list scrolling.

subtitles.original: 【お弁当】差し入れ参加者様
subtitles.english: [Lunch Box] Support Participants

subtitles.original: フルシーンの
subtitles.english: A full scene

subtitles.original: ただ触れて抱きしめていたいよ
subtitles.english: I just want to touch you and hold you tight

subtitles.original: たとえ暗い夜の底で
subtitles.english: Even at the bottom of a dark night

subtitles.original: 少し弾んで
subtitles.english: Bounce a little

subtitles.original: なんてね
subtitles.english: Just kidding

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: Please wait a moment until the performance begins.

subtitles.original: SNSでの感想投稿OK
subtitles.english: Posting impressions on SNS is OK

subtitles.original: 【フラスタ】差し入れ参加者様
subtitles.english: [Flower Stand] Support Participants

subtitles.original: 超電磁波に
subtitles.english: In the super electromagnetic waves

subtitles.original: 紛れて まるごと書き写そう
subtitles.english: Get mixed in and copy it all down

subtitles.original: 空の彼方へ...
subtitles.english: To the beyond of the sky...

subtitles.original: 大盤振るわせてる胸 踊るスパギンガの目
subtitles.english: My heart is pounding, eyes dancing in the super galaxy

subtitles.original: アドベンチャラリラリラ 8分先の未来 誰が求めてる
subtitles.english: Adventure-la-li-la-li-la, who is looking for a future 8 minutes away?

subtitles.original: 無限大の可能性持て
subtitles.english: Have infinite possibilities

subtitles.original: 超電磁波にジャンプして まるごと書き写そう
subtitles.english: Jump into the super electromagnetic waves and copy it all down

subtitles.original: 空の彼方へ 踊れ踊れ
subtitles.english: To the beyond of the sky, dance, dance

subtitles.original: 証明する 超科学的サンデーパ
subtitles.english: Proving it, super-scientific Sunday Party

subtitles.original: 飛び込む バイノーラル
subtitles.english: Dive in, binaural

subtitles.original: 午前零時の帳 街を
subtitles.english: At the stroke of midnight, the town...

subtitles.original: 独り占めしてる気分
subtitles.english: I feel like I have it all to myself

subtitles.original: 散らばったビル灯り 失ったものばかり瞬いている
subtitles.english: Scattered building lights, only the things I lost are twinkling

subtitles.original: 目を閉じて躍ろう
subtitles.english: Close your eyes and dance

subtitles.original: さよならって 終われないし
subtitles.english: I can't just end with a goodbye

subtitles.original: 永遠の夜なんてないのはわかってる
subtitles.english: I know there's no such thing as an eternal night
